name: Sim Aquarium: Best Tanked Aquarium&Fish Tank Games
name_original: Sim Aquarium: Best Tanked Aquarium&Fish Tank Games
description:
Build your Aquarium empire with Aquarium Sea World on your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad!
For all Fish game lovers and Aquarium fans!

Aquarium Sea world is an exciting 3D aquarium experience game that gives you creative control - customize beautiful marine environments for tropical fish.

It is so much fun to watch your fish pets grow from tiny baby fish into amazing adult fish - see for yourself!
Choose from a variety of vibrant backgrounds and charming decor items to turn your sea world into a design masterpiece!

ENJOY THESE FEATURES:
- Buy, raise and sell fish to earn coins and gain experience
- Create your own collections of adorable fish, shark, and turtle!
- Customize your aquariums to your taste with 25+ themed backgrounds and astonishing decorations, to delight of your fish and visitors!
- Explore an exciting aquatic sea world with amusing 3D fish, sharks and turtles!
- Game Center and Facebook support. Interact with your friends: Visit their fish tanks, give likes and create your underwater seaworld together!

Please note! Aquarium Sea World - Fish Tank with Turtles, Sharks, Koi Fish and Blobfish is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device’s Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Sea World - Aquarium & Fish Tank with Turtles, Sharks, Koi Fish and Blobfish? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/FishliveApp
Questions? Contact our tech support at support@mongko.com.
